simple.util.tree
Class Node<T>

java.lang.Object
  simple.util.tree.Node<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the content.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Node<T>>
public class Node<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Node<T>>

Simple node where all child nodes must contain the same content. Node names are determined by calling the content's toString method.
Created: Oct 12, 2010

Author:
Kenneth Pierce

addChild

public boolean addChild(Node<T> node)
Adds the node to the child list and sets the node's parent to this. Does not check for a previous parent. Call remove child on the old parent first!
